title: Cant log in
body: While I'm in the middle of a game i disconnect from league and it closes. So i try and open it back up, and it tells me my password or username  is wrong even though I've reset it and recovered my username. Can someone tell me whats wrong? Or how to fix it?

replies.body: Samething happened to me.. lost a game because of it

We've seen a few reports on this, and it seems to be a patch mis-match.  Restarting the client should fix this up.  Otherwise, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a Force Repatch to make sure you're on the correct update.  Let me know if that helps.

Whenever I try to use the repair tool it crashes "Chromium Embedded Framework Client Application has stopped working."

So, I was in an ARAM and the game bugged out and lagged. I saw one person say "Lag, can't move". After waiting about 5 minutes I exited the game to reconnect, however, when I go to reconnect I continuously get an error saying "Failure to Connect...Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game...'Retry' 'Cancel'". I first try the retry button, same thing came up. I closed out LoL, checked my internet and all is fine, I open up my browser and do an internet speed test and about at 12+ Mbps download and 4+ Mbps Upload. I open up League of Legends again, this time I can't even log in, it was saying my password was wrong (no capslock wasn't on). I close and reopen it and I'm able to log in, so I hit the reconnect button and I get the same error message. At this point 45 minutes have gone by and we were like 15 minutes into the game. I'm still getting the Reconnect button, and I can't connect to my old game or start any new games. Can I get some help?

Same thing is happening with me
